an4.138:1.3: Nikaṭṭhakāyo anikaṭṭhacitto, anikaṭṭhakāyo nikaṭṭhacitto, anikaṭṭhakāyo ca anikaṭṭhacitto ca, nikaṭṭhakāyo ca nikaṭṭhacitto ca.
an4.138:2.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo hoti anikaṭṭhacitto?
an4.138:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:2.3: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi vihiṃsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:2.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo hoti anikaṭṭhacitto.
an4.138:3.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo hoti nikaṭṭhacitto?
an4.138:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:3.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyāpādavitakkampi vitakketi avihiṃsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:3.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo hoti nikaṭṭhacitto.
an4.138:4.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti anikaṭṭhacitto ca?
an4.138:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:4.3: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi vihiṃsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:4.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti anikaṭṭhacitto ca.
an4.138:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti nikaṭṭhacitto ca?
an4.138:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni paṭisevati.
an4.138:5.3: So tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyāpādavitakkampi vitakketi avihiṃsāvitakkampi vitakketi.
an4.138:5.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo ca hoti nikaṭṭhacitto ca.
an4.138:5.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
